Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 21st overall pick, by Montreal in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/3/2015...
Injured on 7/4/2016 with a Tender Elbow, out for one week...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,550,000 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,550,000 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,550,000 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Montreal to Boston on 3/2/2019 (Going to BOS: P Dennis Moore. Going to MON: P Benny McLaurin, P William Sword)...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/20/2019, off Bruce Yearwood (SLB)...
Struck out 15 batters against Houston on 8/22/2019...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (C) on 2/7/2020 to a 4-year deal worth $11,500,000 per year...
Injured on 3/26/2020 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 6/4/2021 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/2/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $2,350,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Colorado on 3/10/2025.
Released by Colorado on 5/21/2025...
